Saya berharap ada fitur untuk menghapus preset di menu Kelola Preset agar lebih fleksibel dalam mengatur build karakter. very good hack and slash combat, great graphics, and a solid story mode that is not only dubbed, but goes beyond even season 2 of the anime. All that said, battle timers for missions nearly kill this game. 90% of the time you end up stuck on a level for weeks, not because of strength, but because the game gives you 2min to travel long distances and kill enemies that run from you.

I already utilize various devices, and despite having a scientifically superior GPU and CPU performance, I still experience occasional lags while playing at high quality. It appears that the animations require a transition between files to extract signals for processing among particles through the CPU, which then bounce back to the devices. The presence of numerous cryptocurrency files within the game, along with hidden downloads occurring during each action or animation, exacerbates this issue

I'm tired of all the same story lines from every RPG, how similar they always are. This game has a refreshing storyline, that I actually care about! The gameplay has an auto function, but it's not the kind of game where you set it and forget it. It keeps you engaged and interacting.
